kothmale holdings samagame widhayaka adhyaksha jud pranandu saha nesle lanka jyeshta upa sabhapathi mohomad hamsa mahathwaru da mehi wethi.shri lankika choklat lolinge mahath wu apekshawan sapuralima sandaha nawatha deshiya welendapola wetha pamina athi nesle hi wadath alum karana saha jathyanthara washayen janadarayata lakwa athi choklat wargayak wana kit kat dan wadath wadi krispi gathiyakin ha krim rasayakin yukthawa oba wetha eyi.”lowa pramukhathama choklat nishpadana samagamak lesa thaman mahath se alum kala choklat wargaya nawatha paminena thuru mahath apekshawen pasu wu shri lankika paribhogikayin sandaha ‘kit kat’ wani goliya washayen piliganmata lakwu nipayumak nawatha handunwa dimata awasthawa labima pilibandawa nesle hi apata mahath aadambarayak.ee wagema shri lankawe choklat nishpadana kshethraya wetha wadath piliganena sankethathmaka choklat wargayak samanga nawatha piwisimata labima da ithama prabodhajanakayi.idiriye di apa paribhogikayin owunge wiwekaya thula kit kat samanga sinawakin pasuwanu dakima ape apekshawayi.”

obe prashna thuna wadagath.jathika prashnaya,sesu wipaksha balawega samaga thibena sambandhathawaya,lankawa wenuwen thorana deshapalana mathawadaya nawa prawanathawaya me gana darana adahasa mokakda kiyana eka wadagath prashnayak.jawipe ha owun athara wenasak thibe nam eya mathuwanuye mema sadhakaya matha.me prashnayata pakshikayek pilithuru dima wada sudusuyi.ma danna tharamin me dinawala ema wyaparaye abhyantharawa loku sanwadayak thibenawa aluthin hadana wyaparaya padanam wiya yuthu prathiththimaya sthawarayan pilibadawa.eeth pasugiya kalaye mema kandayama idiripath kala adahas saha owunge bhawithayath owun pakshayen eliyata eemata balapa hethuth gaththama apata dala washayen pahatha rupaha hadenawa. 1.jathika prashnayedi jawipe jathiwadayata giya bawa owun piligannawa.meka danatama owun prasiddha kathawala wagema - mama ahapu chamirage rohana wijewirage apa rakna urumaya deshanayedi yuddhaya ohu hadinwuye “unge yuddhayak misa ape yuddhayak newe yanuwen - owunge puwathpathe (janarala) kiyala thibenawa.thawamath swayanthiranaya ho swayanpalanaya gana owunge adahasa apahadiliyi. 2.prathipaththiyak lesa owun sabhaga deshapalanaya bahara karana bawa pahadiliyi.mama hithanne me aarowata aasannama hethuwa uneth nila jawipe nayakathwaya sabhaga deshapalanaya wetha yama sadaha daru uthsahaya.wame ananyathawaya kisidu thathwayak yatathe pawa nodiya yuthuyi kiyala owun kiyanawa. 3.lankawata me mohothe awashya mathawadaya kiyana thanadi jathikawadaya ho samaja prajathanthrawadaya wenuwata samajawadaya wenuwen aragala karanna ooneya kiyala pubudu jayagodage deshanayedi ohu prakasha kala.mama danna tharamin owun nyayikawa inne ethana.
